description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the widget hierarchy with MyApp and MyHomePage classes, and setting up the basic UI with app bar and centered content.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that sets up the MaterialApp theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: StatefulWidget representing the main content page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building the scaffold with app bar and content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState classes.
